Result.Title: Madonna against daughter Lourdes acting now
Result.Summary: London, Sep 6 : Pop superstar Madonna is reportedly not allowing her 11-year-old daughter Lourdes to act in a new movie and is determined to not let her enter the world of showbiz until she finishes school.

Result.Title: Life With My Sister Madonna
Result.Summary: The latest tell-all book to be released about Madonna has a unique selling point: it is written by her own brother, a man with more insight and understanding of the star than almost anyone, having grown up with her and acted as her back-up dancer, personal assistant, dresser, decorator, art director, tour director and confidante through most of her career.
